name: Chronic Systemic Inflammatory Response Syndrome (CSIRS)
chief_complaint: I feel exhausted all the time, my joints ache, and I keep getting low-grade fevers
treatment: cognitive behavioral therapy for stress management
prognosis: Variable; condition often follows chronic relapsing-remitting course. Early intervention improves long-term outcomes.
description: CSIRS is a state of chronic, low-grade systemic inflammation without identifiable infectious or autoimmune etiology. Characterized by dysregulated innate immune response and elevated pro-inflammatory cytokines. Often triggered by environmental factors in genetically predisposed individuals.
